duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversight and building out of the compliance department, including the development, administration, and oversight of the implementation of risk management, loss prevention, quality control, and compliance programs.
Team building and guiding efforts towards achieving set compliance goals.
Analyzing market trends, customer behavior, and regulatory changes to identify compliance opportunities and refine strategies.
Overseeing the implementation of risk management, loss prevention, and compliance programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and 2 years of relevant experience, or 5 years of relevant experience are required. Experience in dealing with financial institution regulation is preferred.
